articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Palestinian President
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Sunday sent a message of greetings to Mahmoud Abbas, President of the State of Palestine, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine.
					The message sincerely wished the President and people of Palestine fresh successes in their struggle to establish an independent state of Palestine with Kuds as its capital and achieve lasting and comprehensive peace and security in the Mideast.

articles.title: DPRK Advances to Knockout Stage in Asian Games Football
articles.content:
DPRK Advances to Knockout Stage in Asian Games Football
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's team trounced its Jordanian rival 3:0 in the last league match of the 16th Asian Games on Nov. 13.
					 The DPRK team thus placed first in the group, advancing into the knockout stage of men's football of Asiad.

articles.title: New Distance Lecture System Established
articles.content:
New Distance Lecture System Established
 Pyongyang, November 14 (CKAN) -- A new distance lecture system was established to help the people in the DPRK in their study.
					 The Grand People's Study House made it possible for people to receive distance lectures through people's study houses, libraries and scientific and educational institutions in provinces, cities and counties. 
					
					 Officials and researchers of the Grand People's Study House and the Joint Information Institute of the State Academy of Sciences developed a Korean-style distance lecture system and developed and introduced a two-way distance lecture system which can be operated under any computer operation system in a short span of time. 
					
					 Developers confirmed the number of the subscribers for simultaneous real-time distance lectures on the basis of measurement of server and communication load under different conditions and provided the subscribers with convenience in using the contents of lectures in the database.
					
					 People's study houses in different provinces including Jagang and North Hwanghae provinces and libraries in cities and counties have already made full arrangements for receiving distance lectures from the Grand People's Study House by use of high-speed information system provided by optical fiber communication. This has paved the way for putting the people's educational system on the latest science and technology. 
					
					 Under the new distance lecture system the subscribers can have real time exchange of various images, sound and documents.
					
					 Thanks to the establishment of the new distance lecture system which puts main emphasis on the lectures based on real-time dialogue while providing the subscribers with opportunities to review what had been lectured anytime necessary, working people and students across the country can receive distance lectures in diverse ways according to their study plans.

articles.title: US Attempt to Dominate World by Force Flayed
articles.content:
US Attempt to Dominate World by Force Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is still dreaming of dominating the world by force and its wild ambition for the world domination are creating instability in its various parts. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The above-said moves of the U.S. are no more than a day-dream, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' moves to realize their ambition for dominating the world by force are a grave challenge to the development of history.
					
					 The U.S. has been hell-bent on the development of new type nuclear weapons, seeking to put all the issues related to the development and possession of nukes under its supervision and control and persistently staging sub-critical nuclear tests.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the U.S. imperialists have posed a constant nuclear threat to the anti-imperialist independent non-nuclear states, while providing their allies and followers with "nuclear umbrellas."
					
					 The DPRK has always remained a target of the U.S. imperialists' nuclear strike. As evidenced by many facts which have already been disclosed, the DPRK has been exposed to the danger of a nuclear war posed by the U.S. imperialists several times, beginning with what happened during the Korean war in the 1950s. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK keenly realized through their life experience that it is absolutely impossible to protect the revolutionary gains achieved by their forerunners at the cost of their blood, the dignity of the nation and peace unless they counter the U.S. imperialists' reckless nuclear blackmail with nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent for self-defense is entirely a natural product of the U.S. imperialists' policy of nuclear threat to it.
					
					 Their moves to realize their ambition for world hegemony by force are as foolish an act as digging their own graves.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are landmarks of national reunification and great programmes for independent reunification common to the nation as they represent the requirement of the times and the desire of the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should hold higher the banner of the inter-Korean declarations and turn out as one in a patriotic struggle for implementing them as national reunification presents itself as a more urgent issue and the anti-reunification moves are getting pronounced. 
					
					 They should remain true to the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic idea of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The national reunification should be achieved independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the north and the south free from any outside interference. Only when it is done so, is it possible to successfully achieve national reunification in line with the will and interests of the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans should unite close in the above-said idea, irrespective of party grouping, stratum, region and affiliation, to overcome obstacles and difficulties lying in the way of the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the country's reunification and put spurs to the accomplishment of the June 15 cause.
					
					 They should reject the sycophantic and treacherous cooperation with outsiders and materialize the national cooperation. 
					
					 Only when national cooperation is achieved, is it possible for the Korean nation to safeguard the gains of the June 15 era of reunification from the moves of the separatists at home and abroad and conduct dynamic practical activities to consolidate them.
					
					 It is one of the essential issues of giving momentum to the trend of the June 15 era of reunification to struggle for peace against a war. Only when peace is ensured is it possible to achieve reunification and guarantee the life of the Koreans and prosperity of the nation. 
					
					 Any Korean desirous of living as a member of a reunified nation in a peaceful land free from aggressors and traitors and war should turn out as one in the struggle for peace against a war. 
					
					 All the Koreans should unite close under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and wage a nationwide struggle for frustrating the anti-reunification confrontation moves of the U.S. and treacherous forces. Only then they will have matchless strength and a wide avenue will be paved for the peace and independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Korean People Called on to Hold Higher Banner of Juche
articles.content:
Korean People Called on to Hold Higher Banner of Juche
						
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary idea, the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung is the unique guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and an ever-victorious banner to be upheld by the Korean people through generations, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Thanks to this idea the Korean people could have such strong spirit of independence as carving out their destiny by themselves, uninfluenced by such outdated ideas as sycophancy and dogma.
					
					 They defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, set an example in the worldwide anti-imperialist struggle and built a socialist power--independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense--on this land as they dynamically struggle under the uplifted banner of Juche.
					
					 The revolutionary idea, the Juche idea of the President came to shed more brilliant rays as torchlight in the era of independence under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The revolutionary traits of the Korean people advancing under the revolutionary banner of Juche found their vivid manifestation in firmly protecting the sovereignty of the country and nation, paving a wide avenue for achieving the prosperity of the country by their own efforts and consolidating in every way the single-minded unity of the WPK and revolutionary ranks.
					
					 Only great victory is in store for the Korean revolution and eternal prosperity for the country and nation when the people advance under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Guarantee of Right to Existence Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Guarantee of Right to Existence Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The "people's action for coping with the international meeting" grouping more than 80 civic and public organizations including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally marking the day of people's joint action demanding the guarantee of the right to existence in Seoul on Nov. 11 with at least 10,000 workers and farmers and people from all other walks of life participating. 
					 A declaration adopted at the rally said that the economic crisis now sweeping the world convinces people of the failure of neo-liberal "globalisation." 
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities have imposed misfortune and sufferings upon the people, shoving off the responsibility to them, charged the declaration. 
					
					 It accused the authorities of pushing ahead with the projects for the improvement of four large rivers and persisting in their moves to conclude the humiliating FTA with the U.S. despite the opposition of the absolute majority of the people, thereby wantonly violating the people's life.
					
					 The declaration strongly demanded the authorities stop pursuing unpopular policies and take substantial measures to guarantee the right to existence. 
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration. 
					
					 That day the puppet authorities mobilized at least 3,000 police force of 27 companies to block the rally and the demonstration.

articles.title: US Accused of Its Outrageous Action on Beef Import in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Accused of Its Outrageous Action on Beef Import in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- 17 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held the 134th movement for independent reunification and peace in Seoul on Nov. 9 denouncing the U.S. for its outrageous action to force south Korea to yield to it.
					 The organizations accused the U.S. of pressuring the south Korean authorities to lift the restrictions on the import of beef infected with mad cow disease, ease quarantine regulations, etc. at the additional negotiations for the conclusion of the FTA.
					
					 Noting that the south Korean people will no longer tolerate all sorts of humiliation and sacrifices to be imposed by the U.S. upon them, they declared that they would never allow the U.S. hegemonic action to put the south Korean economic arteries under a tighter control through the conclusion of the FTA.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to stop its moves to conclude the unequal and humiliating FTA.
					
					 They also strongly condemned the U.S. for working hard to plug south Korea into building a missile shield aimed to stir up a war atmosphere on the Korean Peninsula and increase south Korea's economic burden and military dependence on the U.S.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Confrontation with DPRK Flayed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Confrontation with DPRK Flayed in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a statement on Nov. 9 in support of the first installment of a statement released by the inspection group of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The statement branded the case of the "Cheonan" warship sinking as a conspiratorial farce and charade orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces in a bid to bring the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities to stop at once the racket of confrontation with the DPRK and sincerely respond to the proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 We fully support the first installment of the statement released by the inspection group of the NDC of the DPRK disclosing the truth about the "Cheonan" case and extend solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle, concluded the statement.
